body_html: It's not really related to #1787, because there isn't broadcasting going on here. What looks it looks like is happening here is keepdim is False (the default), so the forward squeezes and backward unsqueezes. But in the 1-dimensional case, the squeeze doesn't actually do anything, so the backward is incorrect. I'll fix it.

body: It's not really related to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1787, because there isn't broadcasting going on here.  What looks it looks like is happening here is keepdim is False (the default), so the forward squeezes and backward unsqueezes.  But in the 1-dimensional case, the squeeze doesn't actually do anything, so the backward is incorrect.  I'll fix it.
